subject: Affidavit of Claim Certificate....
body:
Dear Brittany

How are you today?

My name is Mr  Robert Jackson, I am working with  the International  Funds
Control  Department  .


 I  received an instruction from the  FBI Department     to process  the
mentioned  documents in your name. These two documents are what  you need
to receive the transfer  of  $10,500,000.00 to your bank account.

The paying  Bank  is waiting for the Affidavit of Claim and Deed of
Assignment to  release the $10,500,000.00  to your bank account.

I am ready to  secure all  the necessary documents of this transaction in
your name.

 The  following information is needed from you. . I will  apply for
an  Affidavit of Claim Certificate  and Deed of Assignment in your name,  a
copy of your ID is needed.

*To avoid any mistake Fill  information    correctly because we shall  not
be held responsible for any mistake in transferring this $10.5Million
Dollars .*


*  1.Full Name:.....................................................
 2.Address:.......................................................
3.Nationality:...................................................*
* 4.Age:........Date of Birth:.....................................
 5.Occupation:....................................................*
* 6.Phone:...............Mobile:.............:...................*
*7. a copy of Your  passport or id Card  .**  8.State of
Origin:......................*

*Country:.................*
*Your  banking account  information where you wish to receive this transfer
of 10.5Million is needed urgently.*



*The  International Arbitration Court (LCIA) has been notified about the
Affidavit Certificate of the fund  .     waiting for your reply with your
details  to obtain the * *Affidavit of Claims Deed of Assignment* in your
name..



*Regards*

Mr  Robert Jackson
International  Funds Control  Department  .
 phone whatsapp +447479393237

subject: Re: Affidavit of Claim Certificate....
body:
Dear Mr. Robert Jackson,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you are doing well. I appreciate your assistance in processing the mentioned documents in my name. However, before proceeding, I would like to understand more about the transfer and the purpose of these documents.

Could you please provide me with some additional information? Specifically, I would like to know:

1. What is the nature of these funds that are being transferred?
2. How did the FBI Department become involved in this process?
3. Can you explain what the Affidavit of Claim and Deed of Assignment are for?
4. Which bank will be handling the transfer?

Once I have a better understanding of these details, I will be able to provide you with the necessary information requested.

Best wishes,
Brittany

subject: More details
body:
Dear  Brittany

Thanks for your email.

Regarding your question,  the FBI Department wants to monitor the
transaction and  ensure that all the legal documents of these funds  are
secure and provided in your name. so with FBI involvement you are protected
from any other agencies in your country.

2)  The approved funds shall be released to your awaiting bank account from
HSBC BANK OF ITALY.

3  Affidavit of Claim and Deed of Assignment , will stand a proof that HSBC
made a transfer worth $10.5m in your name and the documents will permit
 your bank to allow you withdraw the funds without any question or problem

 We are following the legal means in getting this approved amount credited
into your bank.

Fill the necessary information  for us to start the procurement of these
documents in your name.

. I will  apply for  an  Affidavit of Claim Certificate  and Deed of
Assignment in your name,  a copy of your ID is needed.

*To avoid any mistake Fill  information    correctly because we shall  not
be held responsible for any mistake in transferring this $10.5Million
Dollars .*


*  1.Full Name:.....................................................
 2.Address:.......................................................
3.Nationality:...................................................*
* 4.Age:........Date of Birth:.....................................
 5.Occupation:....................................................*
* 6.Phone:...............Mobile:.............:...................*
*7. a copy of Your  passport or id Card  .**  8.State of
Origin:......................*

*Country:.................*
*Your  banking account  information where you wish to receive this transfer
of 10.5Million is needed urgently.*



*The  International Arbitration Court (LCIA) has been notified about the
Affidavit Certificate of the fund  .     waiting for your reply with your
details  to obtain the * *Affidavit of Claims Deed of Assignment* in your
name..



*Regards*

Mr  Robert Jackson
International  Funds Control  Department  .
 phone whatsapp +447479393237

subject: Re: More details
body:
Dear Mr. Robert Jackson,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this information. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring the security of these funds. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Can you please explain in more detail how the FBI Department is involved in monitoring and securing the legal documents for these funds?

2. Could you provide some more information about HSBC BANK OF ITALY? I would like to know more about their reputation and credibility.

3. What exactly is an Affidavit of Claim and Deed of Assignment? How do these documents ensure that my bank will allow me to withdraw the funds without any issues?

4. Is there a specific reason why my ID copy is needed? How will it be used in the process?

5. Can you clarify what you mean by "the Court LCIA has been notified about the Affidavit of the fund"? What role does the Court LCIA play in this process?

I look forward to your response and gaining a better understanding of how everything works.

Best wishes,
Brittany

subject: Waiting for your reply
body:
Thanks for your email.

Most of these questions have been answered in my previous email.

You are not an FBI agent so don't have any problem with them. They know
what to do .
Your duty as the beneficiary of these funds is to follow my instruction .

you have been told what to do . Therefore I urge you to send the details to
enable me start the process of applying for the necessary documents in your
name.

It  is my duty to communicate with the bank and FBI and get back to you
with necessary information.

For official documentation and record purposes your id or any means of
identification is needed for officials used.

I told you that the Affidavit of Claim and Deed of Assignment  is only
proof your receiving bank will require you to allow you make use of these
funds when it gets into your account.

*To avoid any mistake Fill  information    correctly because we shall  not
be held responsible for any mistake in transferring this $10.5Million
Dollars .*

Mr  Robert Jackson

subject: Money Transfer
body:
I am waiting for your details to  apply for the necessary documents to be
issued in your name. The document is only proof your bank required you to
allow the transfer  of$10.5m to  get into your account.

Everything will be done  correctly for your approved funds  to be
transferred into your account.

subject: Re: Money Transfer
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about the necessary documents you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional details? What kind of documents are these, and what is their purpose? I want to make sure I understand everything correctly before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Brittany

subject: final update
body:
From the look of things it seems you are a joker therefore I will stop
contacting you any longer.
I will write to the bank to cancel the arrangement and have your name
removed from the payroll.

you have been advise many time on what to do but seem to ignore it and
keeping asking the same question

we are not here to exchange email.

Robert

subject: Re: Affidavit of Claim Certificate....
body:
Dear Mr. Robert Jackson,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you are doing well. I appreciate your assistance in processing the mentioned documents in my name. However, before proceeding, I would like to understand more about the transfer and the purpose of these documents.

Could you please provide me with some additional information? Specifically, I would like to know:

1. What is the nature of these funds that are being transferred?
2. How did the FBI Department become involved in this process?
3. Can you explain what the Affidavit of Claim and Deed of Assignment are for?

subject: Re: Waiting for your reply
body:
Hello Mr. Robert Jackson,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate your response and the information you have provided so far. I understand that you have mentioned some details in your previous email, but I just want to make sure I have a clear understanding of the process.

Could you please explain to me again what my role would be in this situation? You mentioned that my duty is to follow your instructions, but could you elaborate on what those instructions are exactly?

Also, regarding the necessary documents, could you please clarify why my ID or any means of identification is needed? Is it for verification purposes or something else?

Furthermore, I would like to know more about the Affidavit of Claim and Deed of Assignment. How do these documents prove that the funds will be transferred into my account? And what should I be cautious about when filling them out?

Lastly, could you please provide more information about the transfer itself? How much money are we talking about here? And how long does the whole process usually take?

I look forward to your response and obtaining further clarification on these matters.

Best wishes,
Brittany
